name: Open Tiles
description:
An open source style tiles for developers who need design help and designers who need inspiration. Plus a real world example.


This was originally found and designed by Abby Larner's Github repo all I did was fork and update the designs for Figma, Sketch and XD. My fork is ðŸ‘‰ Open Tiles


Style tiles were developed by Samantha Warren. To learn more about style tiles, check out her website: styletil.es.
